page.title: 13THE VILLAGE OF WALMER BRIDGE
page.content: Walmer Bridge is a small community of modern houses. Most of these have been built since 1960. There is a small unit of shops with flats over, and a Co-op which sells groceries and has an off-licence { A village Hall}has been built by local fund raising and grants from Local Authorities. This is now used for disco's and meetings. An antique fair is held there regularly on Sundays. Some of the older houses have land which is used for{nurseries}where plants are grown on the moss, many of the seeds are started under glass. One unusual business in the very heart of the village, is a{mushroom {farm.}The mushrooms are grown in a dark shed on horse manure, which is readily available here.
